name: Marla Canady
text: This has always been my preference of pizza to order. This recent order was absolutely a mess. Ordered the standard hamburger pizza, sausage pizza, and pepperoni pizza. None were cheesy and the meat was overcooked. Very disappointed considering how I have always liked pizza hut.

name: Joshua McClain
text: Do not order from here! They are terrible. I ordered delivery and I received this pizza! I was told I had to bring the pizza back to the restaurant for a refund because I paid in cash, mind you the driver just left my house a quick call â€¦More

text: I order a stuff crust supreme and it did have hardly any toppings on it and they gave me thin crust and I didn't ask for thin crust I call my order in and still had to wait when I got there at the time they said it would be ready and I stay 7 minutes or less away and my pizza was cold a total disappointment

name: My Privacy
text:
My first order, they cut the pizza slices very uneven. Try splitting a pizza that is cut like that.
My second order, they gave me the wrong order. Didn't check in store so didn't realize until we made it home.

name: Denise Gibbs
text: Great service and food at the Fairview Heights PizzaHut!

name: CHRIS SIMPSON
text: Disappointed.  Ordered original pan meat lovers with extra cheese and hut favorite crust -. Pizza was just coming out of oven when I picked it up, drove 3 minutes home, it was barely warm, cheese wasn't as melted as usual and no crust flavoring.  Never had this problem at West Main location, my usual, lesson learned!!

name: Lauren Greenlee
text: I will never order from this Pizza hut again, not only do they have very rude delivery drivers but they messed my order up . Said they would give me credit for it, (they never followed up about that. But they also too way more out of my account than what I put on my bill. So out of line and unacceptable. Never again save your money
